auth.signInDescription: Enter your email below to login to your account
auth.magicLinkSent: We've sent a magic link to
auth.clickLinkToSignIn: Click the link in the email to sign in.
auth.checkSpamFolder: If you don't see the email, check your spam folder

email.signInRequest: We received a request to sign in to your account.
email.passwordResetRequest: We received a request to reset your password for your account.
email.orCopyLink: Or copy and paste this link in your browser:
email.linkExpires: This link will expire in 15 minutes.
email.didntRequest: If you didn't request this, you can safely ignore this email.

error.magicLinkError: Error sending magic link. Please try again.
error.signInError: Error signing in. Please try again.
error.passwordResetError: Error resetting password. Please try again.
error.genericError: An error occurred. Please try again later.
error.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
